entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow at times. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
